article: Kate's brother Danny  made  some New Year's resolutions this year.  _  , he is going to learn  to play  the guitar. She is going to take the guitar lessons  _  practice every day. Next he wants to get good  _  . He is going to study  harder  and he is going to do all his homework  _  he watches TV. Finally, he wants to learn  _  new language. He is going to buy some  _  CDs and practice  _  at home every morning.
